Package coreapi

Class OrderService

  • java.lang.Object
    • coreapi.OrderService
  • public class OrderService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as a service provider and interface for the client to work with objects from the Order class. Modifying and operating an object of the order class should always be done through the methods provided here.
    Version:
    0.2
    Author:
    Maria, Borja, Fran

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      OrderService​(CafeteriaData cData, OrderData oData, ProductData pData)
      Create a new object of type OrderService with the information of a Cafeteria, order and specific products.

    • Method Detail

      • addProductToOrder

        public void addProductToOrder​(Cafeteria coffe,
                              Order ord,
                              Product prod,
                              int quantity)
                       throws InsufficientStockException
        Adds the indicated amount of product to the order passed as an argument.
        Parameters:
        coffe - The Cafeteria related to the order.
        ord - The order to add the product to.
        prod - The product to add to the order.
        quantity - The quantity of product to add to the order.
        Throws:
        InsufficientStockException - If there isn't enough stock of the product.

      • removeProductFromOrder

        public void removeProductFromOrder​(Cafeteria coffe,
                                   Order ord,
                                   Product prod,
                                   int quantity)
                            throws InsufficientStockException,
                                   ProductNotContainedInOrderException
        Removes the indicated amount of product from the order passed as an argument.
        Parameters:
        ord - The order to remove the product from.
        prod - The product to remove from the order.
        quantity - The quantity of product to remove from the order.
        coffe - The coffee which restock the product.
        Throws:
        InsufficientStockException - If the quantity to remove is bigger than the quantity which is stock in the order
        ProductNotContainedInOrderException - If the product isn't in the basket

      • OrderStatus_Payed

        public void OrderStatus_Payed​(Order ord)
                       throws UnreachableStatusException
        Sets the status of the order passed as parameter to PAYED if the order current status is either OPEN
        Parameters:
        ord - The order to change the status of.
        Throws:
        UnreachableStatusException - If the conditions to set the PAYED status aren't met.

      • OrderStatus_Finished

        public void OrderStatus_Finished​(Order ord)
                          throws UnreachableStatusException
        Sets the status of the order passed as parameter to FINISHED if the order current status is PAYED.
        Parameters:
        ord - The order to change the status of.
        Throws:
        UnreachableStatusException - If the conditions to set the FINISHED status aren't met.

      • getTotalDailyRegister

        public java.math.BigDecimal getTotalDailyRegister​(Cafeteria coffe,
                                                  java.time.LocalDate date)
                                           throws InvalidDateException
        Returns the number of orders register from the indicated cafeteria on the designated day.
        Parameters:
        coffe - The cafeteria from which to calculate the cash register.
        date - The day to which calculate the cash register.
        Returns:
        Returns the combined cost of all orders made on the specified date.
        Throws:
        InvalidDateException - If the date is greater than the system date.

      • getNumberOfDailyOrders

        public int getNumberOfDailyOrders​(Cafeteria coffee,
                                  java.time.LocalDate date)
                           throws InvalidDateException
        Returns the cash register from the indicated cafeteria on the designated day.
        Parameters:
        coffee - The cafeteria from which to calculate the cash register.
        date - The day to which calculate the cash register.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of orders that have been on the specified date.
        Throws:
        InvalidDateException - If the date is greater than the system date.

      • getValidationCode

        public java.lang.String getValidationCode​(Order ord)
        Returns the validation code of the order.
        Parameters:
        ord - The current order.
        Returns:
        Returns the validation code of the concrete order.

      • getValidationStock

        public boolean getValidationStock​(Order ord,
                                  Cafeteria c)
        Returns true or false based on whether enough products are available from an order.
        Parameters:
        ord - The current order.
        c - The current coffee.
        Returns:
        Returns true if there is enough stock of products and false otherwise.

      • getProgrammingDate

        public java.time.LocalDateTime getProgrammingDate​(Order ord)
        Returns the date for which the corresponding order has been scheduled.
        Parameters:
        ord - The current order.
        Returns:
        Returns the date and time of the scheduled order.
